cofh.api.block

Interface IBlockAppearance


  • public interface IBlockAppearance
    Implement this interface on blocks that can mimic the appearance of other blocks. Note that this is meant to be available server-side, so ensure the code is server-safe and doesn't use client-side code.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block getVisualBlock(IBlockAccess world, int x, int y, int z, ForgeDirection side)
      This function returns the block that is being shown on a given side.
      int getVisualMeta(IBlockAccess world, int x, int y, int z, ForgeDirection side)
      This function returns metadata of the block that is being shown on a given side.
      boolean supportsVisualConnections()
      This function returns whether the block's renderer will visually connect to other blocks implementing IBlockAppearance.

    • Method Detail

      • getVisualBlock

        Block getVisualBlock(IBlockAccess world,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int z,
                   ForgeDirection side)
        This function returns the block that is being shown on a given side.
        Parameters:
        world - Reference to the world.
        x - X coordinate of the block.
        y - Y coordinate of the block.
        z - Z coordinate of the block.
        side - The side of the block.

      • getVisualMeta

        int getVisualMeta(IBlockAccess world,
                int x,
                int y,
                int z,
                ForgeDirection side)
        This function returns metadata of the block that is being shown on a given side.
        Parameters:
        world - Reference to the world.
        x - X coordinate of the block.
        y - Y coordinate of the block.
        z - Z coordinate of the block.
        side - The side of the block.

      • supportsVisualConnections

        boolean supportsVisualConnections()
        This function returns whether the block's renderer will visually connect to other blocks implementing IBlockAppearance.
